a few songs at Room 5 this Sunday

I have been hard at work on finishing Sky Meet Sea so I haven't played out in a while but this Sunday I will be playing a short set at Room 5.

Come on out if you are around, I'm on at 8:15p and it's a great lineup all night.

I'll be playing songs from the upcoming album.

Room 5 - upstairs at Amalfi Restaurant 143 N. La Brea Ave

By Krister Axel on 02/22 2012 at 13_03 in News
